content.text: We are located in the historic center of Rosia Montana 331, in a heritage house, that was a bank, medical center, cinema and then our grandparents who worked in mining industry used it for living. We preserved the painting, the wooden floor, the windows, the heating with terracotta stoves and we added new bathrooms and kitchen so now we offer accommodation, guided tours and bikes. The rooms (houses) have separate entries from a common yard with hammocks, gazebo, green grass and a nice view to the Cânic massif.

In the past here was a bank with one meter wide stone walls, where the miners changed the gold in money and dynamite. Here are 2 bunk beds for 4 pers + bathroom + kitchenette + library + wifi + heating with terracotta stove.

images.text: Books house - We transformed a cupboard into a library with old books, guides about Rosia Montana and board games.
Books house - In the showcase are old photos and crystal clusters rocks.
Books house - private bathroom and kitchenette (equipped with: coffee/tea machine, fridge, microwave, dishes and cutlery).

content.text: This place was the old summer house transformed into a small apartment for 2 pers (twin or double) + bathroom + well equipped kitchen + library + wifi + heating with terracotta stove

images.text: Little house - a duble bed + a single bed, books, maps and guides about Roșia Montană
Little house room - the entrance in the private bathroom and kitchen are directly from the room. The heating is done by a terracotta stove on woods.
Little house room - private bathroom and kitchenette (equipped with: coffee/tea machine, fridge, hob, sink, microwave, dishes and cutlery).

content.text: The 'tarnat' has 2 rooms with some old and well preserved characteristics: the access through 'tarant' (an external hallway with small windows), the almost 100 years old painting and some small exhibits. Here can stay maximum 6 pers (each room has 1 double + 1 simple bed) + bathroom + kitchenette + library + wifi + heating with terracotta stove

images.text: Tarnat room 1 - has one double bed and an extendable bed for 1 person.
Tarnat room 2 - has a double bed (that can be separated) and 1 person bed.
Tarnat living - with living, library and bath.
Tarnat bath and kitchenette (equipped with: coffee/tea machine, fridge, microwave, dishes and cutlery).

content.text:
Bikes for rent, bike repair, bike tours.
Guided tours through the historic center, natural monuments, mining galleries and pits.
Wifi, board games, library.
Backyard with hammocks, gazebo, green grass.
Movie screenings with documentaries about Rosia Montana
Sleighing - we have 2 sleighs so during the winter there are sleigh slopes near the house

images.text: We offer guided tours (by foot or bike) and we also rent bikes.
In the backyard we have hammocks, wifi, gazebo, movie screenings.
